tweet: Congratulations! 🎉 #MonerEOS Snapshot is complete!  📸 Today on the XMR block 1806598 and EOS Block Number 51,419,304 Mainnet Launch: April 8 19:30 UTC You can check your XME balance on the official website:  https://t.co/IqFr2nBsuD Desktop version is available!  #EOS $EOS #XMR

There are very few books I really recomend to know how public blockchain technology works, these are the most relevants (mastering Bitcoin & Ethereum by @aantonop, and Monero by @serhack_). I'd love to add the Mastering Zcash one explaining ZKSNARKs, @zooko...  https://t.co/y85zKpdZXz

Looking to revisit this build - Have not covered the R9 280x yet in the PROGPOW testing. These 3GB Cards would no longer support Ethereum given the DAG size, but other networks including #xmr #rvn #ubq #egem #tube performance might be interesting to see on latest software.  https://t.co/OizDKxezNu

All the #MonerEOS wallets are working fine! Desktop version (Win 32-64/Mac) is available on the main website.  If you want Web,use MyMonerEOS wallet:  https://t.co/Glt1fgqp7w Works quickly and correctly.  #Monero #XMR #Fork #EOS $EOS $XMR
Since I've learned so much about #cryptocurrency for work, I decided to get in the game myself. I am now the proud owner of some #XBT, #XMR, and #ZEC and I'm sure more will be added soon.
If anything Nip death made me realize stop glorifying money let alone materialistic ideals & focus on oneself & bettering others around you.
